name: Lets Machine Learning
description:
Lets Machine Learning is designed specifically for young children who are interested in learning to code. It has a structure that encourages learning about Machine Learning. The resources available in the game contribute to this learning process.

In this 2D puzzle game developed in Unity, the main goal is to complete tasks and earn money. Our character is a freelance worker who helps people in different fields of Machine Learning, from a detective to a teacher. Through these tasks, the game demonstrates how diverse and versatile the applications of Machine Learning can be.

You can download and play our game, or use it as an educational resource.
